statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({4.32}+{4.59}\right)}={17.82}\approx{17.82}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{4.59}\cdot{3.62}={16.6158}\approx{16.6}.
